plot: After Butters turns down a fat girl that asks him out, Wendy is upset over Butters' crush on Kim Kardashian because she says Kim is actually a short fat hobbit who uses photo shop to make herself look more attractive.

After Butters turns down a fat girl that asks him out, Wendy is upset over Butters' crush on Kim Kardashian because she says Kim is actually a short fat Hobbit who uses Photoshop to make herself look more attractive. But events turn against Wendy.—The Kimobbit

Butters says no to a fat girl (who happens to be Wendy's friend) asking him out, Butters says that Kim Kardashian is his girlfriend, and Wendy calls her a "Hobbit" then gets in trouble when Mr. Mackey claims she's "jelly" then shows Butters that Kim Kardashian uses computers to make herself look good. Then shows him the girl who asked him out what she would look like if she did what Kim Kardashian does. Meanwhile everybody starts photo editing their girlfriends and Wendy gets more angry. Then Kanyae West argues with the students claiming that Kim is not a "Hobbit".
